params.groupSql: select distinct t.id, t.parent_id as parentId, t.name, t.code as description from usrvf_gg.gtv_org_golden t where t.id >=:groupId
params.userSql: select distinct u.id, u.org_id as groupId, u.user_name as loginName, u.user_name_cn as userName, u.email, null as sex, null as birthday, u.re_mark || ', ' || u.job_name as employeeNo, null authMethod from usrvf_gg.gt_user u where u.org_id >= :groupId and u.is_enable = 1 and u.user_type_id = 117 and (u.user_name like 'BL%' or u.user_name like 'TM%' or u.user_name like 'OS%')
params.singleUser: select distinct u.id, u.org_id as groupId, u.user_name as loginName, u.user_name_cn as userName, u.email, null as sex, null as birthday, u.re_mark || ', ' || u.job_name as employeeNo, null authMethod from usrvf_gg.gt_user u where u.id = :userId
